vote.title: Authorize a cooperative purchasing agreement for the purchase and installation of audio/video equipment to accommodate continued social distancing due to COVID-19 via enhanced virtual broadcasting capabilities to the 6FN Park and Recreation Boardroom for the Park & Recreation Department with Digital Resources, Inc. through The Local Government Purchasing Cooperative (BuyBoard) agreement - Not to exceed $143,727.49 - Financing: General Fund
